attributes.action: Set up legislation to prevent hedge funds from borrowing stock from UK pension funds which they subsequently short sell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The borrowing & shorting (selling assets they don't own to buy back later at a lower cost) of UK pension fund assets not only erodes the retirement funds of the pensioners directly it also impacts on the value of the UK stock market. If hedge funds had no way of obtaining shares to short sell it 'might' take some of the current volatility out of the market and preserve pension assets.
